meta.title: Sasha ‚Äî iOS / SwiftUI Developer

hero.title_line2: I build iOS apps with SwiftUI.
hero.description: I‚Äôm a developer and a Wirtschaft & Informatik student in Germany. Right now I‚Äôm working on GloboSense ‚Äî a video interpreting app that helps people find human translators (including sign-language interpreters).

about.title: About me
about.text: I like building clean, practical products and iterating fast. I‚Äôve worked hands-on across app UI, backend integration, and realtime calling features.
about.li1: Focus: iOS development, product MVPs, and scalability thinking
about.li2: Also enjoy: Unity prototyping, 3D modeling in Blender

building.title: What I‚Äôm building now
building.text: GloboSense ‚Äî a platform for people who need a translator. The goal is to make it easy to schedule or instantly call an interpreter, and support interpreter agencies too.

skills.title: Skills snapshot
